Target Practice.name: Target Practice
descriptions: Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 3%.
Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 6%.
Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 9%.
Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 12%.
Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 15%.

Efficiency.name: Efficiency
descriptions: Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 40% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 60% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 80% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 100% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Stinging Shots.name: Stinging Shots
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 10%, and the duration of all stings by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 20%, and the duration of all stings by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 30%, and the duration of all stings by 30%.
Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 40%, and the duration of all stings by 40%.
Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 50%, and the duration of all stings by 50%.

Lethal Shots.name: Lethal Shots
descriptions: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 1%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 2%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 3%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 4%.
Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 5%.

Scatter Shot.name: Scatter Shot
descriptions: A short-range shot that deals 50% weapon damage and disorients the target for 4 seconds.  Any damage caused will remove the effect.  Turns off your attack when used.

Detonation.name: Detonation
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 1 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 1.5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 2 sec.

Hawk Eye.name: Hawk Eye
descriptions: Increases the range of your Bows, Crossbows, and Guns by 2 yards.
Increases the range of your Bows, Crossbows, and Guns by 4 yards.
Increases the range of your Bows, Crossbows, and Guns by 6 yards.
Increases the range of your Bows, Crossbows, and Guns by 8 yards.
Increases the range of your Bows, Crossbows, and Guns by 10 yards.

Headshot.name: Headshot
descriptions: Gives your Auto Shot, True Shot, and Concussive Shot a 2% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Auto Shot, True Shot, and Concussive Shot a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Auto Shot, True Shot, and Concussive Shot a 6% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Auto Shot, True Shot, and Concussive Shot a 8% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.
Gives your Auto Shot, True Shot, and Concussive Shot a 10% chance to stun the target for 3 seconds.

Mortal Shots.name: Mortal Shots
descriptions: Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 30%.

Trueshot Aura.name: Trueshot Aura
descriptions: Increases the attack power of friendly units within 40 yards by 50.  Lasts -0.001 seconds.

Barrage.name: Barrage
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 10%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 15%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 20%.
Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 25%.

Scorpid's Spite.name: Scorpid's Spite
descriptions: Reduces the Stamina of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 33% of the amount of Strength reduced, and reduces the chance your stings are dispelled by 10%.
Reduces the Stamina of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 66% of the amount of Strength reduced, and reduces the chance your stings are dispelled by 20%.
Reduces the Stamina of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 100% of the amount of Strength reduced, and reduces the chance your stings are dispelled by 30%.

Ranged Weapon Specialization.name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 10%.

Take Aim.name: Take Aim
descriptions: Zoom in and focus on your attacks. Removes the cast time of Aimed Shot, and increases the range of your Volley, Hunter's Mark, Stings, and all Shots besides Scatter Shot.
